Package org.apache.commons.codec.android.binary

Base64, Base32, Binary, and Hexadecimal String encoding and decoding.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
Base32 Provides Base32 encoding and decoding as defined by RFC 4648.
Base32InputStream Provides Base32 encoding and decoding in a streaming fashion (unlimited size).
Base32InputStreamTest  
Base32OutputStream Provides Base32 encoding and decoding in a streaming fashion (unlimited size).
Base32OutputStreamTest  
Base32Test  
Base32TestData This random data was encoded by OpenSSL.
Base64 Provides Base64 encoding and decoding as defined by RFC 2045.
Base64Codec13Test Tests to make sure future versions of commons-codec.jar have identical Base64 behavior as commons-codec-1.3.jar.
Base64InputStream Provides Base64 encoding and decoding in a streaming fashion (unlimited size).
Base64InputStreamTest  
Base64OutputStream Provides Base64 encoding and decoding in a streaming fashion (unlimited size).
Base64OutputStreamTest  
Base64Test Test cases for Base64 class.
Base64TestData This random data was encoded by OpenSSL.
BaseNCodec Abstract superclass for Base-N encoders and decoders.
BaseNCodecInputStream Abstract superclass for Base-N input streams.
BaseNCodecOutputStream Abstract superclass for Base-N output streams.
BaseNCodecTest  
BinaryCodec Converts between byte arrays and strings of "0"s and "1"s.
BinaryCodecTest TestCase for BinaryCodec class.
Codec105ErrorInputStream Emits three line-feeds '\n' in a row, one at a time, and then EOF.
Hex Converts hexadecimal Strings.
HexTest Tests Hex.
StringUtils Converts String to and from bytes using the encodings required by the Java specification.
StringUtilsTest Tests StringUtils
 

Package org.apache.commons.codec.android.binary Description

Base64, Base32, Binary, and Hexadecimal String encoding and decoding.
